data.content_en: Everything you see exists together in a delicate balance.
data.content_zh: 世界上所有的生命都在微妙的平衡中生存。

data.content_en: I’m only brave when I have to be. Being brave doesn’t mean you go looking for trouble.
data.content_zh: 我只是在必要的时候才会勇敢，勇敢并不代表你要到处闯祸。

data.content_en: Yes, the past can hurt. But I think you can either run from it or learn from it.
data.content_zh: 我只是在必要的时候才会勇敢，勇敢并不代表你要到处闯祸。

data.content_en: Yes, the past can hurt. But I think you can either run from it or learn from it.
data.content_zh: 对，过去是痛楚的，但我认为你要么可以逃避，要么可以从中学习。
